definition: to take a customer's order/(of a taxi driver) to accept a booking/(of a delivery rider) to accept a delivery job
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
surname Shan
bill/list/form/single/only/sole/odd number/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: How much lead - time do you need?
sentences.chinese: 您从接单到完成需要多久的准备时间？

sentences.english: Shenhu town, this event allows many medium export orders by businesses more cautious.
sentences.chinese: 该事件使得深沪镇不少中型出口企业接单更为谨慎。

sentences.english: Wang Yao, the more practical considerations of new orders from the enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 至于王尧，则更多从企业接单现实考虑。

sentences.english: There are numerous factories in China which I have called order-takers.
sentences.chinese: 目前中国有无数的我称为接单厂家的工厂。

sentences.english: When the waitress came to take the order, she asked how Suchen was doing with the smoke.
sentences.chinese: 女侍者过来接单时，问苏晨有没有受到烟雾影响。

sentences.english: Primary duty is to ensure highest level of quality order fulfillment through order receipt to product delivery of Celanese products.
sentences.chinese: 在从接单到发货的全过程中确保订单高品质地执行。

sentences.english: To expand the European and Japanese customers, to quote and order receiving.
sentences.chinese: 要展开欧洲和日本的客户，报价和接单。

definition: to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
(purchase) order
to place an order (commerce)
to call a cab (by phone)/to request a ride (via an app)
to put together an order of goods
to deliver goods
to take on a piece of work/to pick up some freelance work/(of a taxi driver) to pick up a fare
to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to drive a vehicle for its owner (often as a paid service for sb who has consumed alcohol) (abbr. for 代理駕駛|代理驾驶[dai4 li3 jia4 shi3])/substitute driver (abbr. for 代駕司機|代驾司机[dai4 jia4 si1 ji1])
home delivery of meal
to put together an order and deliver it (i.e. 配貨|配货[pei4 huo4] and 送貨|送货[song4 huo4])/to deliver (goods)
to dispatch/to send out goods
to generate fake transactions in order to game a commercial online platform (one that rewards users who make numerous transactions)
to bill/to open a tab
to order goods/to place an order
a tax declaration form/a tax return
